Name: Northern Blades
About the game: The story unfolds in the neutral territory of the northern lands, where among the small settlements, stand the fortress of our heroes, called 'Fang'. But this fortress is inhabited not only by ordinary people, there are also those who decided to discard their humanity and become a weapon that protects these and neighboring lands from various creatures, including themselves... One of these was a young warrior named Key, who gave up everything in order to once again stand up to defend human destinies. Again and again the blade of his sword was directed at the enemies of humanity, but it seems that this time, it will not be so easy for him to get out of the trap in which his bloodied soul was. - Original Soundtrack - High-quality 2D sprites and backgrounds - A fascinating story - Dynamic story with the gradual addition of acts At the moment, only the first act of this visual novel is available to you, subsequent acts will open over time in the form of free updates. - Act I - Completed! - Act II - In Progress! - Act III - In Progress! - Short DLC - maybe maybe... Thank you for your patience <3
